QuestData.Title: Lost, Not Forgotten
QuestData.Description:
I know not what madness has overtaken my people, but we must stop it together.
Take this bell. It calls the souls of the recently deceased to it for later release. We Stormsong do not bury our dead in the earth. The tides claim all.
If they will not answer to reason, then we must give them eternal peace. Fallen or not, they are Stormsong.
QuestData.LogDescription: Recover $1oa souls using the Dead Ringer.
QuestData.RewardText: It is done. We will release them somewhere a bit more peaceful.
